message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'd be happy to pay $75 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $90 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell it to you for $82.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me in the middle.  I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for it.
I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $81.
